ThingDef.label: awakened carrier dryad
ThingDef.description: A dryad caste specialized in carrying items. Its awakening has improved their size, carrying capacity and added functionality as a pack animal for long-distance hauling.\n\nAwakened dryads have both advantages and disadvantages compared to their bound relatives. While more proficient, specialized and unshackled, they can neither morph nor receive nourishment from a queen, resulting in a very limited lifespan.

ThingDef.label: awakened clawer dryad
ThingDef.description: A dryad caste with huge claws that is specialized in aggression and damage-dealing attacks. Its awakening has improved their combat prowess and strengthened the wings, permitting them to ignore terrain movement penalties.\n\nAwakened dryads have both advantages and disadvantages compared to their bound relatives. While more proficient, specialized and unshackled, they can neither morph nor receive nourishment from a queen, resulting in a very limited lifespan.

ThingDef.label: awakened barkskin dryad
ThingDef.description: A dryad caste specialized in absorbing hits during combat. Its awakening has created multiple layers of hardened bark and deadened all pain receptors. Can act as a mobile form of cover.\n\nAwakened dryads have both advantages and disadvantages compared to their bound relatives. While more proficient, specialized and unshackled, they can neither morph nor receive nourishment from a queen, resulting in a very limited lifespan.

ThingDef.label: awakened woodmaker dryad
ThingDef.description: A slow, bumbling caste of dryad which specializes in wood production. Its awakening has accelerated the wood-like material production and instilled a motherly instinct to create nests made of numerous twigs.\n\nAwakened dryads have both advantages and disadvantages compared to their bound relatives. While more proficient, specialized and unshackled, they can neither morph nor receive nourishment from a queen, resulting in a very limited lifespan.

ThingDef.label: awakened medicinemaker dryad
ThingDef.description: A dryad caste specialized in medicine production. Its awakening has accelerated the herbal production and gives them a large nodule that slowly accumulated neutroamine, which can be milked when full.\n\nAwakened dryads have both advantages and disadvantages compared to their bound relatives. While more proficient, specialized and unshackled, they can neither morph nor receive nourishment from a queen, resulting in a very limited lifespan.

ThingDef.label: awakened berrymaker dryad
ThingDef.description: A dryad caste specialized in food production. Its awakening has accelerated the berry production and instills an instinct to bury parts of its peeling hide that are entirely similar to regular berry bushes.\n\nAwakened dryads have both advantages and disadvantages compared to their bound relatives. While more proficient, specialized and unshackled, they can neither morph nor receive nourishment from a queen, resulting in a very limited lifespan.

ThingDef.label: awakened stonedigger dryad
ThingDef.description: An extremely easy-going caste of dryad which specializes in finding stone chunks. Its awakening has instilled a sense of awe and strengthened pincers, drawing envy from stone ruins and carving excavated stone chunks into blocks to build a better shell.\n\nAwakened dryads have both advantages and disadvantages compared to their bound relatives. While more proficient, specialized and unshackled, they can neither morph nor receive nourishment from a queen, resulting in a very limited lifespan.

ThingDef.label: awakened nectarmaker dryad
ThingDef.description: A curious dryad caste specialized in ambrosia production. Its awakening has accelerated the ambrosia production and allows it to permanently root itself, transforming into a hardy Ambrosia Palm tree.\n\nAwakened dryads have both advantages and disadvantages compared to their bound relatives. While more proficient, specialized and unshackled, they can neither morph nor receive nourishment from a queen, resulting in a very limited lifespan.

ThingDef.label: awakened spitter dryad
ThingDef.description: A dryad caste specialized in territorialism and can launch ranged acid projectiles. Its awakening has improved their range and adds large acid reservoirs that explode when the dryad dies.\n\nAwakened dryads have both advantages and disadvantages compared to their bound relatives. While more proficient, specialized and unshackled, they can neither morph nor receive nourishment from a queen, resulting in a very limited lifespan.

ThingDef.label: awakened gaubricmaker dryad
ThingDef.description: A caste of dryad which specializes in producing a unique shaggy, leather-like material. Its awakening has accelerated the fabric production and lengthens the shagginess, turning it an adorable, living wonder-mop that cleans up messes.\n\nAwakened dryads have both advantages and disadvantages compared to their bound relatives. While more proficient, specialized and unshackled, they can neither morph nor receive nourishment from a queen, resulting in a very limited lifespan.
